name: Gutter Punk
description:
Gutter punks are part of an anti-social movement that rejects mainstream society and attempts to emulate their version of the punk movement from centuries past.

Inspired by the punk rockers of history, gutter punks often wear ragged clothing consisting of torn pants, loose-fitting shirts, and sleeveless leather or jean jackets. Their jackets are decorated by themselves or their gang members using paint or markers. They favor spiked or studded embellishments and wear outlandish hairstyles and brightly painted augmentations designed to draw maximum attention.

Gutter punks mostly live in slums or abandoned buildings alongside their fellows. Their counter culture ideals put them at odds with most authority figures, making honest work scarce, which in turn makes it hard for them to escape poverty.

features.name: Ability Score Increase
features.description: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, your Constitution and Technology scores increases by 1.

features.name: Age
features.description: Gutter punks often don’t live to old age, although this is due to their living conditions and lifestyle rather than any genetic reasons. If they are fortunate to live a healthy lifestyle, a gutter punk can expect to live around 100 years.

features.name: Speed
features.description: Due to many years running away from law enforcement and running towards trouble, you’re slightly quicker on your feet than most people. Your base walking speed is 35 ft.

features.name: Shotgunners
features.description: Due to its effectiveness in tight alleyways, the weapon of choice for gutter punks is the combat shotgun. You are proficient with this weapon.

features.name: Adaptive
features.description: Gangs need a wide variety of skills. You may pick one skill of your choice to become proficient in.

features.name: Misspent Youth
features.description: You’ve grown up on the streets and have some basic contacts and a small reputation for yourself. You begin with Influence: Street 3.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write English, and two other languages of your choice.
